title: How to write a letter to a headmaster requesting him to issue a study certificate - Quora

response.answer_text: I would write a formal letter along the lines of the following example: TO: Raj Adminn, Headmaster, Scholastic Institute, Quora, OH 12345 REF: Request for Study Certificate, Course 101115/Your Name Please issue my Study Certificate for this course since I have completed and passed all course work. I need this no later than April 10, 2018. Should there be any questions, please contact me by email at yourname@gmail.com or 545/231–1234. Thank your for your consideration and help. Sincerely, Your Name If time is critical, consider hand delivery to his office or registered/certified mail. The key point is to clearly identify course number, name, student name, when course was completed. Make it easy for him to dig out the information and send along to you. Adding a date needed by also will spur him to action.
